title: Very enjoyable
review: Most horror movies tend to have a lackluster story but this one has a great cast and story while still being a great horror movie

title: Great movie
review: The effects don't look great but they were enjoyable none the less a great movie classic

title: Great sequel
review: Great action with better effects than the first all the characters act reasonably which is a rare for lots of movies can't wait for the new one

title: Feel good movie
review: Agree with the adverts saying its a feel good film. Enjoyable even if you dont known the beatles, but it is made a lot better if you know the beatles quite well

title: Its alright as a standalone
review: If it was a standalone movie it was alright, i felt that toy story 3 was a satsfying ending and this felt undeeded but if you are a bug fan of toy story you may as well give it a watch

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Quite long
review: Personally I feel that the movie would be better on a rewatch

title: The story is goid
review: Film was good, animation stellar... But (especially for kids) id chose the cartoon version anyday! The facial expressions and therefore characters emotions are almost completely lost in the realistic style.

title: Same quality as the first
review: I thought the first was brilliant and the second followed perfectly. If you liked the first one it is a must watch. Actor choice was brilliant.
